  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public Actions allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
      A method to check if the tree has fruits for the player to pick
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Ground
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      location - the current Location
      direction - the direction of the Ground from the Actor
      Returns:
      A return string from PickFruitTreeAction to indicate if a fruit has been picked or not.

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      A tick function. After several ticks, the trees will grow.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the Ground

    • ripening

      public boolean ripening​(Location location)
      A method to randomly determine whether the tree produces a fruit. Calls produceFruit method to do so if it wins the 20/80 coin flip.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the current tree
      Returns:
      A boolean to indicate if a fruit has been produced or not.

    • produceFruit

      public Fruit produceFruit​(Location location)
      A method to produce a fruit.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the tree
      Returns:
      The fruit object.

    • dropsFruit

      public void dropsFruit​(Location location)
      A method to drop a ripe fruit from the tree onto the ground.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the tree

    • getFruits

      public java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> getFruits()
      Gets the list of fruits.
      Returns:
      Fruits

    • removeFruit

      public Fruit removeFruit()
      Removes fruits.
      Returns:
      Either removes fruits from the fruits ArrayList, or nothing.
